name: Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods
text: (Quick Effect): You can return this card to your hand; Special Summon 1 "Witch's Cauldron" from your hand, Deck, or GY in face-up Defense Position. You can only activate this effect of "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods" once per turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If "House" leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods" once per turn.
